title: Alimens & Gentle Men's Dress Shirts 16-Way Stretch Slim Fit Long Sleeve Button Down Shirts Wrinkle Free Traveler Shirts
description: 16 way stretch fabric: mens traveler dress shirts are made of 74% nylon and 26% spandex, flex, soft and moisture wicking, just the right amount of stretch fabric properties for unrestricted movement and dry comfort. While the wirnkle free fabric offers easy care at home and less ironing

More than everyday style: mens stretch dress shirt is not only suitable for work, office and dailywear. Whether you're meeting with clients, catching the red flight, or need a power look, this dress shirts help you get where you're going and always look great

Adapts to your ever changing lifestyle: mens button down shirt are easy to match. You can pair it with trousers and a blazer for a business look. Or couple this stretch dress shirts with jeans for a casual look. Formal or casual is up to you
Slim fit: elastic fabric fits perfectly on all body type. Slim fit long sleeve dress shirt is with spread collar, button closure for a sleek look
Care: hand wash or machine wash cold, low temperature drying, low iron if necessary
